languages.text: Whenever the wearer suffers a trauma, if possible, all allies immediately attack their nearest enemy with the attack normally costing the least AP.

traits.locale_text: When wearer gets trauma all allies immediately attacks nearest enemy with cheapest attack, if they can
Whenever the wearer suffers a trauma, all their allies immediately attack their nearest enemy with the attack that normally costs the least AP if possible.

languages.text: Cuando el portador sufre una aflicción, todos los aliados que puedan hacerlo atacan al enemigo más cercano con su ataque normal que menor coste de PA tenga.
languages.original_text: Whenever the wearer suffers a trauma, if possible, all allies immediately attack their nearest enemy with the attack normally costing the least AP.

traits.locale_text: Cuando el portador sufre una aflicción, todos los aliados que puedan hacerlo atacan al enemigo más cercano con su ataque normal que menor coste de PA tenga.

languages.text: 使用者が戦闘で外傷を受けるたび、可能であれば、すべての味方が最も近い敵を、最も消費APが少ない通常攻撃で即座に攻撃する。
languages.original_text: Whenever the wearer suffers a trauma, if possible, all allies immediately attack their nearest enemy with the attack normally costing the least AP.

traits.locale_text: 使用者が戦闘で外傷を受けるたび、可能であれば、すべての味方が最も近い敵を、最も消費APが少ない通常攻撃で即座に攻撃する。

languages.text: 当装备者受到创伤时，在可能的情况下，所有盟友都会以通常情况下消耗行动点数最低的攻击方式，攻击各自距离最近的敌人。
languages.original_text: Whenever the wearer suffers a trauma, if possible, all allies immediately attack their nearest enemy with the attack normally costing the least AP.

traits.locale_text: 当装备者受到创伤时，在可能的情况下，所有盟友都会以通常情况下消耗行动点数最低的攻击方式，攻击各自距离最近的敌人。

languages.text: Chaque fois que le porteur subit un traumatisme, les alliés attaquent immédiatement l'ennemi le plus proche avec leur capacité coûtant le moins de PA.
languages.original_text: Whenever the wearer suffers a trauma, if possible, all allies immediately attack their nearest enemy with the attack normally costing the least AP.

traits.locale_text: Chaque fois que le porteur subit un traumatisme, les alliés attaquent immédiatement l'ennemi le plus proche avec leur capacité coûtant le moins de PA.

languages.text: Erleidet der Träger ein Trauma, attackieren alle Verbündeten wenn möglich sofort den nächstgelegenen Gegner mit dem Angriff, der normalerweise am wenigsten AP kostet.
languages.original_text: Whenever the wearer suffers a trauma, if possible, all allies immediately attack their nearest enemy with the attack normally costing the least AP.

traits.locale_text: Erleidet der Träger ein Trauma, attackieren alle Verbündeten wenn möglich sofort den nächstgelegenen Gegner mit dem Angriff, der normalerweise am wenigsten AP kostet.

languages.text: Когда персонаж получает травму, его союзники, если это возможно, немедленно совершают против своего ближайшего противника атаку, требующую меньше всего ОД.
languages.original_text: Whenever the wearer suffers a trauma, if possible, all allies immediately attack their nearest enemy with the attack normally costing the least AP.

languages.text: Takan kişi, travmaya maruz kaldığında mümkünse tüm dost birimler, anında en yakın düşmana normalde en az EP harcayan saldırı ile saldırırlar.
